relations.title: Sustainability of Digital Formats: Planning for Library of Congress Collections

name: MBOXCL2 Email Format
extras: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?><metadata><field name="formatCategory">text</field><field name="filenameExtension"></field><field name="internetMediaType"></field><field name="pronomPUID"></field></metadata>
description: MBOXCL2 is one of the MBOX family of related file formats used for holding collections of email messages within a single file. MBOXCL2 files use the content length header to identify a new message, not "From " lines.
